nodes.text: A Near-Human male was captain of a Rebel Alliance transport. A few weeks after the Battle of Yavin, he moved a team of operatives from a starport to Titan Base to prepare for a mission. He was laconic and surly, and closed the bridge off during the trip.
The captain appears in "Operation: Shell Game," the adventure in Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Beta, released at Gen Con Game Fair in 2013.
